S

scaleSize - Variable in class view.Map
 
sendEnemies(ArrayList<Enemy>) - Method in class controller.Client
sends a list of enemies to the other user needs to be sent one at a time sends enemyliststart first to indicat a new list and enemylistend to indicate the end of the list
sendGameOver(boolean, Player, int, int) - Method in class controller.Client
sends a gameover message to the other user
sendGameState(PacketHeader, Object) - Method in class controller.Client
sends one of two gamestate messages to the server
sendMessage(String) - Method in class controller.Client
sends a message to the other user if the message is "send X" then it sends the other user X amount of moneys
sendPacketHeader(PacketHeader) - Method in class controller.Client
Sends the packet header to the server Used for when you are joining the lobby and want the lobby list or creating a new lobby
sendServerGameOver(PacketHeader) - Method in class controller.Client
sends a GameWon or GameLost message to the server
sendTowers(ArrayList<Tower>) - Method in class controller.Client
sends a list of tower to the other user needs to be sent one at a time sends towerliststart first to indicate a new list and towerlistend to indicate the end of the list
server - package server
 
Server - Class in server
Creates a server that forwards traffic between multiple clients

setGameOver() - Method in class controller.GameBoy
sets the other player as DC thus causing a game over screen
setMap(Map) - Method in class controller.GameBoy
 
setMapNumber(int) - Method in class model.Player
Sets the map the player is on
setNewEnemiesList(ArrayList<Enemy>) - Method in class controller.TowerDefenseMain
takes the list from the server and changes the enemy list
setNewTowersList(ArrayList<Tower>) - Method in class controller.TowerDefenseMain
takes the list from the server and changes the tower list

setupLobbyList(TableView) - Method in class controller.Client

setWaveNumber(int) - Method in class model.Player
